block_comment: This block of code assigns a logical value to the variable 'data_end' depending on the value of 'col_size'. If 'col_size' is non-zero, 'data_end' is assigned the value of the condition (offset_r == 2'b11). If 'col_size' is zero, 'data_end' is assigned the value of the least significant bit of 'offset_r'.
